posts.post_title: wanted to buy--I am starting a RAW (can you believe it) g-vg set-
posts.post_content:
Decided to take the opposite direction and do a lowish grade raw set since I sold my collection 2 yrs ago.---..Looking to buy groups each time as opposed to indiv.cards.  So if you have quanties, large or small, of good-vg condition, let me know best price please.  email is [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url] ( am also still looking for PSA 6,7,and 8's for several friends I help with their setscell is 770 873 1181

thanks
Bill Latzko

a raw set!--as my son said when he was little and didn't know the entire word., "that's citing"  (exciting)
